job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongJob DescriptionstrongppInductive Automation the leader in cuttingedge software for the industrial sector and beyond is looking to add talented people to our rapidly growing teamppbrppWe are a unique innovative and fun company with a strong mission to empower our customers to swiftly turn great ideas into reality by removing all technological and economic obstacles We have a huge passion for our product and our customers no matter what role you might play in the company you can sense that there is something special about what we do and who we areppbrppWere looking for a Software Engineer to join our Information Systems department as we design build test and support the applications and systems that keep our organization moving forward Youll partner with stakeholders from other business units like Software Engineering Sales Support Finance and Marketing to develop new solutions for complex business needs enhance existing applications and services and improve how our systems facilitate the processes of the businessppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliCollaborates with team members to design develop maintain and enhance software solutions built in a variety of technologiesliliWorks with design teams project owners and stakeholders to understand the needs functionality and user flow of requested featuresliliEnsures features are well tested documented and deployed safely with no interruptions to production systemsliliWrites code that is traceable in production to provide expedient bug tracing and quick resolutionsliliParticipates in crossfunctional discussions to clarify objectives and propose solutionsliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliBachelor Degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or equivalent experienceliliStrong Python experienceliliExperience writing complex SQL queries for normalized dataliliExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsliliExperience in gathering and analyzing requirementsliliExcellent technical troubleshooting skillsliliFamiliarity with Web technologies HTML5 JavaScript CSSliliFamiliarity with Linux Ubuntu Server and DesktopliulpnbspppbrppstrongSkills Not Required But a Plusstrongpulli23 years experience developing customerfacing softwareliliExperience in fullstack development of internal or customerfacing systemsliliExperience in developing and interacting with RESTful APIsliliExperience with MySQL server and normalized database designliliExperience with optimization of complex SQL queriesliliExperience in gathering and analyzing requirements as part of a development cycleliliExperience with developing in IgnitionliliFamiliarity with JavaliliExperience with Agile development Kanban or Scrumliulpp
